alert.note: Alert for Berrien; Branch; Cass; Hillsdale; St. Joseph (Michigan) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS NorthernIndiana (Northern Indiana and Northeastern Ohio)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued February 18 at 10:07PM EST until February 19 at 10:00AM EST by NWS NorthernIndiana
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 10 AM EST /9 AM CST/ SATURDAY... * WHAT...Areas of blowing and drifting snow expected. Additional snow accumulations of up to one inch. Winds gusting as high as 50 mph. * WHERE...Portions of northern Indiana, southwest Michigan and northwest Ohio. * WHEN...From 6 PM EST /5 PM CST/ this evening to 10 AM EST /9 AM CST/ Saturday. * IMPACTS...Blowing and drifting snow resulting in snow covered roads, sharply reduced visibility and hazardous travel conditions in open areas. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Wind gusts along the incoming cold front have been up to 45 to 50 mph, with visibilities quickly reduced to less than one half of a mile at times within the associated snow band. Those travelling tonight should prepare for sudden reductions in visibility, an abrupt wind shift to the west- northwest, and blowing and drifting snow.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. Allow extra travel time and expect varying road conditions and visibility in open areas.

area.areaDesc: Berrien; Branch; Cass; Hillsdale; St. Joseph
